titles.title: Come, For The Spirit Saith, Come

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come, for the Spirit saith, Come.
Whosoever will may come;
Whosoever thirsteth, let him come to Me and drink.
Come, for the Spirit crieth, Come.
Whosoever thirsteth, come.
He that drinks of Me shall have everlasting life.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come, Lord, I hear You saying, Come.
Lord, I hear Your voice cry, Come.
So I come to drink of Your everlasting life.
Come, even so, Lord Jesus, Come;
Even so, come quickly, Come.
Glorify Thy Name.
Even so, Lord Jesus, Come.
